name: henry-diagnostics
description: Sistema de Gestión de Taller Mecánico - Henry Diagnostics

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd src/client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd src/server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd src/server && npm install && npx prisma generate --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.setup: npm run setup:server && npm run setup:client
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd src/server && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:deploy: cd src/server && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.lint: cd src/server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd src/server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test

author: Henry Diagnostics
